long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a cool extension that extends the WhatsApp Web capabilities by adding some cool features like:
- View once media disabler * There is a problem with this feature right now so it's working only if you are signing out and signing in.
- Keep revoked messages
- Keep edited messages
- Indicate sender OS
- @everyone, @admins really works
- See blue ticks without sending them
- Forward message to unlimited number of groups
- Fullscreen mode
- Delete for everyone old messages
To activate the extension, a subscription is required for 2$.
A pop up will be opened for you when you will enter WhatsApp-Web.
Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated with, associated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by WhatsApp or its parent company. WhatsApp is a registered trademark of WhatsApp LLC.
